text: Ojo musrikon dar zamin gardis nakardaand, to ʙuʙinand sarancomi kasone, ki pes az onon ʙudand, ci guna ʙudaast? On aqvomi guzasta nerumandtar az inho ʙudand va osoru ʙinohoi ʙestare dar zamin padid ovardand, ammo Alloh taolo ononro ʙa [saʙaʙi] gunohonason azoʙ kard, dar hole ki dar ʙaroʙari [azoʙi] Alloh taolo hec [jor va] mudofe'e nadostand
